name: Mirellia Q Melromarc - Rising of the Shield Hero
description:
Another nice Waifu. This time from Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari. Mirellia was really wasted on Trash.

Got good results with: <lora:Mirellia_Q_Melromarc:0.45>, Mirellia_Q_Melromarc, big_breasts, purple_hair, purple_eyes

Her extra accessories seems to be behind jewelry and earrings( <lora:Mirellia_Q_Melromarc:0.45>, Mirellia_Q_Melromarc, big_breasts, purple_hair, purple_eyes, jewelry, earrings).

Her Hair and eyes tends to become pinkish without stating the color.

The dataset was surprisingly hard to collect, I would have expected to be more stuff about her floating around.
